name: Spellmonger Magic
description: War Mage profession and magic system from the Spellmonger series of books by Terry Mancour.

name: thaumaturgy
description: Your skill and knowledge of not only the science of magic, but a scientific understanding of the universe, which is required to manipulate it.

name: enchanting
description: Your skill with enchantment, making and using magical devices to accomplish tasks.

name: alchemy
description: Your skill and knowledge involving magical substances and concoctions.

name: thermomancy
description: Your skill and knowledge involving heat and cold magical effects.

name: psychomancy
description: Your skill and knowledge involving neurology and the mind.

name: photomancy
description: Your skill and knowledge involving light and illusions.

name: hydromancy
description: Your skill and knowledge involving water and ice.

name: geomancy
description: Your skill and knowledge involving the element of earth.

name: umbramancy
description: Your skill and knowledge involving magical obfuscation and stealth.

name: biomancy
description: Your skill and knowledge involving magic as applied to health, healing, and diseases.
